name: Wrestling With Emotions: New Kid on the Block
storyline:
Get ready for a far-out adventure that flips the dating sim genre upside down and powerbombs it through a ringside table! It's time to bodyslam a diverse cast of muscle cuties and wrestling weirdos!

The world's cuddliest choice-based life / wrestling / dating simulator is back! Enter the surreal world of 'Wrestling With Emotions' with a game that's bursting with heart, humor and muscle-bound cuties! Create yr dream wrestle-babe and tell a unique story of bent rules, broken hearts and bulging biceps!
summary: It’s time to kick ass and break hearts! Wrestling with Emotions: New Kid on the Block is a wrestling dating sim that combines elements of RPGs and punk games to create a uniquely anarchic experience.
